Posts.Content: I'm on Letrozole and have in the past month had to go on bp tablets. I had problems a few years ago which got sorted, but here we go again. So I can't say if it is the medication or not this time. I say to myself it's just one of those things and I'm pleased to be here. Oh yes, and a cataract and I'm only 58! Bring it on!
Posts.Title: High blood pressure and letrozole/zoladex
